body_html: I don't think it's right to permit square(sqrt) for semi-negative values, except negative zero (as per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Signed_zero, your first example). At zero, this is a boundary value, and your code should probably not rely on any particular behavior for the gradient, since it's undefined.

body: I don't think it's right to permit square(sqrt) for semi-negative values, except negative zero (as per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Signed_zero, your first example). At zero, this is a boundary value, and your code should probably not rely on any particular behavior for the gradient, since it's undefined.
